name: applicant_sequence
description: order of the applicants on the patent application, beginning with zero; sequence for this table begins at {1}.

name: applicant_authority
description: The type of interest the applicant has in the intellectual property rights of a patent or application. May be equal to inventor, legal-representative, party-of-interest, obligated-assignee, assignee, or null.

name: raw_applicant_name_first
description: first name, if applicant is an individual

name: raw_applicant_name_last
description: last name, if applicant is an individual

name: raw_applicant_organization
description: organization name if applicant is an organization

name: rawlocation_id
description: unique location id generated by the disambiguation algorithm
